name: LikeMe
description:
Our Game is a social multiplayer - get some friends together to have some fun in our prototype! Choose your own avatar, customize your apartment and Like / Dislike your friends! You can even Report them if you feel they deserve it.  Your likes serve as currency,  so use them to buy new items for your apartment!

To start the game: One person has to create a server with the name, the other 3 players can access it via "List Server"

Have fun!
